title: crab
body: <!-- id=116--><!-- isMature=0 -->This is a video taken in 6000 feet of water.  An undersea robot is sawing a 3 mm wide slit (1/10th of an inch... remember that width) in an empty pipeline.  The pressure inside the pipeline is 0 psi, while the pressure outside is 2700 psi, or 1.3 tons per square inch.  <a href="http://www.mediagab.com/filedump/crabvspipe.mpeg">Then a crab comes along</a>...
bodyArticleHtml:
2003-01-07

crab

This is a video taken in 6000 feet of water. An undersea robot is sawing a 3 mm wide slit (1/10th of an inch... remember that width) in an empty pipeline. The pressure inside the pipeline is 0 psi, while the pressure outside is 2700 psi, or 1.3 tons per square inch.

bodyNavItems.text: a practical use for McD's fry grease
